title: Tier 3 team looking for scrims
body:
Hello, I like many have been left disappointed after clash being cancelled. However, i would still like to play against some teams for fun /practice.

Add me on league if you and your team would like to play some custom 5v5s. We were a tier 3 team so ideally would like to vs the same tier.

We would play at the same time as clash would have, at 930pm which will follow with a short scouting period then game start.

I hope to see you on the rift!
